conclusion: The area of the coil is 0.4 m², and the magnetic induction intensity is 0.1 T, directed along the positive x-axis.
The image depicts a rectangular coil ABCO placed in a uniform magnetic field, initially oriented at a 60° angle with the z-axis.
Calculate the initial magnetic flux: 0.4 x 0.1 x cos(60°) = 0.1 Wb.
Calculate the final magnetic flux: 0.4 x 0.1 x cos(0°) = 0.04 Wb.
Calculate the change in magnetic flux: 0.04 - 0.1 = -0.06 Wb.
